b:widget.title: We Connect Korean and Filipino Communities Through Media Innovation

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: PinoySeoul Media Enterprise empowers cultural exchange through 24/7 streaming, creator partnerships, and AI-powered content serving Filipino communities and K-culture enthusiasts worldwide.

We've built a legacy connecting Korean and Filipino communities through trusted media platforms. From our EPS-TOPIK community to 24/7 radio streaming, we create authentic cultural bridges through content that resonates. Our team combines cultural expertise with modern technology to deliver content that matters to both Korean workers in the Philippines and Filipinos in Korea.
Our content serves the actual needs of Filipinos learning Korean and K-culture fans seeking authentic experiences.
Access our 24/7 radio streaming and community support anytime. We're here when our community needs us most.
Eight years of successful events, partnerships with Kroma, Wilbros, BENCH, and Disney+, plus a thriving online community prove our commitment to authentic cultural exchange.
Our AI-assisted content workflow allows us to maintain quality programming while keeping operations sustainable. Modern tools meet cultural authenticity.
Our team understands both Korean and Filipino cultures deeply. We don't just translatewe create content that respects and celebrates both communities.
Every playlist curated, every article written, and every event organized comes from genuine passion for connecting Korean and Filipino communities worldwide.
Connecting Korean-Filipino influencers with brands for authentic marketing campaigns. We bridge content creators and companies seeking genuine cultural reach in both markets.
Your 24-hour K-pop and OPM streaming platform plus AI-powered content hub. Serving Filipino community members with authentic Korean entertainment news, drama reviews, and cultural content.
Intensive hands-on workshops providing real-world media production experience. Students work on actual PinoySeoul projects, building portfolios while contributing to live content.

b:widget.title: We Build Platforms That Bring Communities Together

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Our technology serves authentic community needs through mobile apps, web platforms, and streaming infrastructure. From radio.pinoyseoul.com to our Android app, we make cultural connection accessible anywhere. Explore our developer profile to see innovation driven by community purpose.

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"
"window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:widget.title: Your Professional, Reliable & Valuable Partner in Asia

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: There are several ways in which we can help you! We provide our services throughout Europe, Americas, Middle East, Africa and Asia-Pacific. Below are some testimonials from satisfied partners that worked with us.
Used the SRT to my video project. Fast and efficient! 100% recommend!
Their team often replies via email and you get a prompt response when you contact them.
Excellent. Delivered weekend transcription ahead of schedule.
On-time and accurate, even with technical topics.

span.span: PS Media connects Korean and Filipino communities through authentic storytelling and innovative platforms. Since 2017, we've grown from a simple website to a multi-platform media enterprise trusted by over 136,000 community members. Our mission is creating sustainable cultural exchange that benefits both communities equally.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Simply fill up the form or email/call us at the phone number below to talk with our Account Executive.
